en.title: Enable Focalboard
en.description: Focalboard integrates project management tools like kanban boards, cards, and tables with Mattermost to help you easily plan projects, manage tasks, and run effective meetings.

en.title: Welcome to your new sidebar
en.description: Your sidebar just got better. New updates include custom collapsible categories, drag-and-drop organization, unread channel filtering and more.

en.title: Testing if server version is ignored
en.description: The new [Extended Support Release](https://docs.mattermost.com/administration/extended-support-release.html) v5.31 is now available offering many bug fixes for increased stability, and improved status updates for Incident Management. [Upgrading](https://docs.mattermost.com/administration/upgrade.html) only takes a few minutes.

en.title: New server version available
en.description: The new feature release offers shared channels, stakeholder overview and ad hoc tasks for incident collaboration, file search, and more. [Please also see the important upgrade notes](https://docs.mattermost.com/administration/important-upgrade-notes.html).

en.title: Introducing custom statuses
en.description: Setting a custom status lets you express your status in any way you prefer by adding a descriptive status message and emoji thatâ€™s visible to everyone throughout the app.

en.title: New desktop version available
en.description: Upgrade now to access custom desktop notification sounds, Russian spell check, and an improved user experience using multiple workspaces.

en.title: test1 Collapsed Reply Threads are here, get early access to the beta
en.description:
You can now enable an early beta of Collapsed Reply Threads in **Account Settings** > **Display** > **Collapsed Reply Threads (Beta)**

Please [review the list of known issues](https://docs.mattermost.com/help/messaging/organizing-conversations.html) as we work towards stabilizing the feature.

en.title: test Collapsed Reply Threads are here, get early access to the beta
en.description:
You can now enable an early beta of Collapsed Reply Threads for this workspace in **System Console** > **Experimental** > **Collapsed Reply Threads (Beta)**

Please [review the list of known issues](https://docs.mattermost.com/help/messaging/organizing-conversations.html) as we work towards stabilizing the feature.
